title: Can we get a refund on the mystery skin?
body: Or trade with someone? I got Magnificent TF and I can't really play TF...

replies.body: Mystery gifts cannot be refunded. Now there's even more incentive for you to learn TF.
i got eternum noc from my mystery gift
that happened to me - I got spirit udyr and my udyr is sheeeeeit.
If we could swap I would, I love Udyr.
